verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to me <S%H559>again,<s%> saying,

What do you <S%H4911>mean,<s%> that you use this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> sour <S%H1155>grapes,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are set on <S%H6949>edge?<s%>
As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> you shall not have occasion any more to <S%H4911>use<s%> this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H5315>Behold,<s%> all souls are <S%H5315>mine;<s%> as the soul of the <S%H1>father,<s%> so also the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5315>mine:<s%> the soul who <S%H2398>sins,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
But if a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H6662>just,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%>

and has not <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> neither has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> neither has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> neither has come <S%H7126>near<s%> to a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H5079>impurity,<s%>

and has not <S%H3238>wronged<s%> <S%H376>any,<s%> but has <S%H7725>restored<s%> to the <S%H2326>debtor<s%> his <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> has <S%H1497>taken<s%> nothing by <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and has <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment;<s%>

he who has not given <S%H5414>forth<s%> on <S%H5392>interest,<s%> neither has <S%H3947>taken<s%> any <S%H8636>increase,<s%> who has <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> has <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> between <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H376>man,<s%>

has <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and has <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H571>truly;<s%> he is <S%H6662>just,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
If he <S%H3205>fathers<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> who is a <S%H6530>robber,<s%> a <S%H8210>shedder<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H251>any<s%> one of these <S%H259>things,<s%>
and who <S%H6213>does<s%> not any of those <S%H398>duties,<s%> but even has eaten on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%>

has <S%H3238>wronged<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> has <S%H1497>taken<s%> by <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> has not <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> and has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%>

has given <S%H5414>forth<s%> on <S%H5392>interest,<s%> and has <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H8636>increase;<s%> shall he then <S%H2425>live?<s%> he shall not <S%H2421>live:<s%> he has <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> his blood shall be on <S%H1818>him.<s%>

<S%H3205>Now,<s%> behold, if he fathers a <S%H1121>son,<s%> who <S%H7200>sees<s%> all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H2403>sins,<s%> which he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H7200>fears,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> not such <S%H2004>like;<s%>

who has not <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> neither has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has not <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%>

neither has <S%H3238>wronged<s%> <S%H376>any,<s%> has <S%H2254>not<s%> taken anything to <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> neither has <S%H1497>taken<s%> by <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> but has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and has <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment;<s%>

who has <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> who has not <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> nor <S%H8636>increase,<s%> has <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> has <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes;<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

As for his <S%H1>father,<s%> because he <S%H6233>cruelly<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed,<s%> <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H1499><s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> that which is not <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4191>behold,<s%> he shall die in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> Why <S%H1121>doesn't<s%> the son <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father?<s%> When the <S%H1121>son<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> and has <S%H8104>kept<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2421>them,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live.<s%>

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H2398>sins,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father,<s%> neither shall the <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1121>son;<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be on <S%H7564>him,<s%> and the wickedness of the wicked shall be on <S%H7563>him.<s%>

But if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from all his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

None of his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> against <S%H6666>him:<s%> in his righteousness that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Have I <S%H2654>any<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh;<s%> and not rather that he should <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H2421>live?<s%>

But when the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> according to all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H6213>does,<s%> shall he <S%H2425>live?<s%> None of his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> deeds that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall be <S%H2142>remembered:<s%> in his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> that he has <S%H4604>trespassed,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> in them shall he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H1004>now,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> Is my <S%H1870>way<s%> not <S%H8505>equal?<s%> <S%H1870>Aren't<s%> your ways <S%H8505>unequal?<s%>

When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H5766>therein;<s%> in his iniquity that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H7563>Again,<s%> when the wicked man turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

Because he <S%H7200>considers,<s%> and turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from all his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Yet the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>fair.<s%>" <S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1870>aren't<s%> my ways <S%H8505>fair?<s%> <S%H1870>Aren't<s%> your ways <S%H8505>unfair?<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H1004>you,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H7725>Return,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves from all your <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> so <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall not be your <S%H4383>ruin.<s%>

Cast <S%H7993>away<s%> from you all your <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> in which you have <S%H6586>transgressed;<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> yourself a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> for why will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

For I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of him who <S%H4191>dies,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H2421>yourselves,<s%> and live.
